Pathetic rules on competitive cooldowns. You allow thousands of people to blatantly hack, yet when you successfully manage to call a vote to kick, You then kick the genuine players and slap them with a "20 minute competitive cooldown for kicking"......... What is the point in having the option to vote off cheating & abusive players if your going to penalise the ones that actually want to play fairly? 

In a shorter sum up to people who want to buy CS:GO

DONT BUY IF YOU DONT HACK
